title: Movie Poster Letters (Identification Game)
content:
Thought this might be fun!

[Poster Letters ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012053427/http:/www.empireonline.com/features/posterletters/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012053427im_/http:/typophile.com/files/letters_5464.jpg)
author: beejay

comments.content: It's gotta be Trajan… oh, hang on a minute, I don't hink I've quite understood what's supposed to be going here…
Wait do I name the typefaces or movies hehe!

These are called logo extraction puzzles, and the first one was the [Retail Alphabet Game](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012053427/http:/www.joeykatzen.com/alpha/). For a while, there were lots of them at logogame.com, but it looks like that site disappeared.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012053427im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GAMESMay2008_Cover%5B1%5D_4285.jpg)

yeah, name the movie :)

Iron Man, Shrek, Bug's Life, Saturday Night Fever, etc.

quite a few of the letters are custom drawn, btw.

I got 28 out of 46.

#41 isn't fair. That could be anything.
I only got 5 or 6... Some of them are easy to recognize because they are contemporary, some because they are custom. :-)
